col_1.title: Bienvenue sur Anwani
col_1.description: L'application qui vous permet de créer une adresse réelle en moins d'une minute...

col_2.title: C'est simple
col_2.description: Créer votre adresse ou voir celles qui existent déjá

top.title: Anwani Features in detail
top.description: Anwani is available in 3 versions for individual citizens, businesses and government.

col_1.title: Create Address
col_1.description: Seamlessly create an address for any of your residences or businesses.

col_2.title: View Existing Address
col_2.description: Any individual, business or government entity can view their own address or an address that has been shared with them.

col_3.title: Manage Address
col_3.description: Any individual, business or government entity can manage their multiple addresses anytime on the fly and have it updated in the cloud instantaneously.

col_1.title: User & Share Address
col_1.description: Organizing an event? Have an eCommerce site and want to start door-to-door delivery? It's simple, share your address in our app!

col_2.title: Add Locational Photo
col_2.description: Not only can you create an address but you also have the option to add a picture of your residence/business in seconds.

col_3.title: Address Receipt
col_3.description: Receive a digital receipt of your address creation and ensure no one else can duplicate or copy yours.

features.tertiary: * The Anwani business and government APPs are not available in the Google playstore. Please contact contact@coders4africa.com to get those APPs.
